summary: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.
cast: Javier Beltrán|Robert Pattinson|Matthew McNulty|Marina Gatell|Bruno Oro|Esther Nubiola|Marc Pujol|Arly Jover|Simón Andreu|Vicky Peña|Rubén Arroyo|Diana Gómez|Pep Sais|Joan Picó|Ferran Audí|Adria Allue|Ferran Lahoz|Christian Rodrigo|Sue Flack|Adrian Devant|Ramon Enrich|Xavi Siles|Philippa Goslett|Hannah Rútzou|Paco Alonso|Piero Verzello
title: Little Ashes
